item.title: Download XILS-lab PolyM 1.5.4
item.description: XILS-lab PolyM is a software synthesizer plugin designed to simulate the sound of a classic Polymoog analog synthesizer. The polymoog was a groundbreaking instrument widely used in the 1970s and known for its rich and warm sound. PolyM offers a powerful and versatile audio engine that includes two oscillators, multi-mode filters, and a wide range of modulation sources. It also includes a built-in chorus and delay effects, which can be used to enhance the sound and create space and...
